title: NVIDIA Shield TV update patches Plex media server issues and other bugs
content:
Last month, NVIDIA officially released Shield Experience 9.0.0 to all of its TV devices — including the original 2015 model. This update bumped the Android TV version to 11 and added support forÂ the next generation of GeForce NOW cloud gaming in 4K HDR. However, just like most major software updates, it introduced several bugs that

The post NVIDIA Shield TV update patches Plex media server issues and other bugs appeared first on xda-developers.
description: NVIDIA is rolling out Shield Experience 9.0.1 with several bug fixes, including a patch for the Plex media server issues.
